scripts.validate_filename: node ./node_modules/validate_filename/index.js -e '^[a-z0-9\-_./]+$' -m '约定文件名由小写字母、数字、_组成' `git diff --staged --name-only --diff-filter=ACMRTU`
scripts.sasslint: files=`git diff --staged --name-only --diff-filter=ACMRTU | grep -iE '\.s[ac]ss$'`; if [ "${files:=empty}" != "empty" ]; then ./node_modules/.bin/sass-lint --verbose --no-exit $files; fi
scripts.eslint: files=`git diff --staged --name-only --diff-filter=ACMRTU | grep -iE '\.js$'`; if [ "${files:=empty}" != "empty" ]; then ./node_modules/.bin/eslint -c .eslintrc.json $files; fi
scripts.jsnext: mkdir -p js/lib; cp -rf jsnext/{lib,config.js} js; ./node_modules/.bin/babel jsnext -d js --ignore jsnext/lib,config.js --source-maps inline --watch

ghooks.pre-commit: npm run validate_filename && npm run sasslint && npm run eslint
